creditline: Gift of Tom Rassieur in honor of Lynn and Frank Rassieur
description: axe-like weapon on wooden staff; head etched on each face with scrolling foliage against a stippled blackened ground; axe-blade with the crossed staves of Burgundy impaling a coronet and dividing the letters "FAR"; head with open socket and four side-straps; wooden haft (probably original)
title: Halberd
